attributes.action: Ensure that the proposed "Travelers" site in Cambourne Cambridge does NOT happen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a new and developing community putting the extra pressure of integrating a travellers site would put undue stress on the area.

Cambourne is largely filled with first time buyers trying to buck the current trend and by locating this site here you will ensure that further development is stunted and new mortgages in the area are lessened.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ensure that the proposed "Travelers" site in Cambourne Cambridge does NOT happen."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21263


Prime Minister's Office
